page.title: 05Church Lads and Church Girls
page.content: I go to a club called the Brigade. We meet at 6 p.m. on Mondays. Each evening lasts until 8.00 p.m. When we get there we line up and pay our sub, which is 15p. After this we work at our project. Once you complete a project you get a badge. Sometimes we go on visits to the seaside or we go camping. We have to go to church on the second Sunday of each month. We have an annual Parade. This year we went to Leicester Cathedral for a service, and afterwards we went outside to march around the city. We do have a uniform. It consists of a navy skirt with a navy top. The girls have to wear a white sash which has a gold ring at the bottom. We have red ties, blue ties and green ties. I am in the red section.
